response.overview: Two ice climbing fanatics discover the sport's holy grail, Helmcken Falls, Canada where a cave features hundreds of feet of overhanging, barely-climbable ice.
response.tagline: Will Gadd and Tim Emmett discover the holy grail of ice climbing, Helmcken Falls, Canada where a cave features hundreds of feet of overhanging, barely climbable ice.
response.title: Ice Revolution
